resources.string: On the following screen, you\'ll see an interactive map. Move towards Points of Interest (POIs), listen to exciting cultural stories, and answer quiz questions for points. Enjoy your cultural adventure, have a fantastic time exploring and learning about different cultures!

This application is part of the intercultural Erasmus+ project "Playing & Learning From the Past" (2021â€“1-EL01-KA220-SCH-000027810 )that aims to contribute to the support and development of emerging cultural and digital literacy of learners, along with the improvement of literacy skills, by utilizing the cultural identity of each country using online applications.
